Articles.Content: Finally made a successful Mun landing! A bit late to the party of course, but after hours of failed landings (and loading quicksaves), kinda felt the need to share.

Hm. Do it without quickloading. Every time you fail you have to fly there again. That\'s what makes you a man. Back in my day the trip was uphill both ways.

wd anyway. Keep practicing until you can do it every time without crashing.

Heh I actually didn\'t discover the quicksave feature until the last couple of hours. I can get to the mun with only a touch of fuel from the 2nd stage. Its just the final touch down bit I\'m having trouble with lol.

Back in my day the trip was uphill both ways.

Back in my day, we where doing the calculus on slide rulers and drawing the frames, by hand.. A really good KSP player could get 5PPD (Pages Per Day)

Back in my day, we where doing the calculus on slide rulers and drawing the frames, by hand.. A really good KSP player could get 5PPD (Pages Per Day)

lol flipbook ksp.
